entries.meaning: A man who sells (and, formerly, prepares) an artist's paints. [from 17th c.]
examples: The Least, my Colourman will run away with, is fifty pounds per annum; my house with taxes stand me at least in Seventy […].

entries.meaning: (British spelling, broadcasting) A commentator employed to provide background information, analysis, etc., on a given news or sports event. [from 20th c.]
